cesdspy.records¶

cesdspy.records.endpoint = 'records'¶

The endpoint for this module

cesdspy.records.get(api_url, model_id, record_id, query={})¶

Get a single record

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – The base url to query
  • model_id (string) – The model id
  • record_id (string) – The record id
  • query (json) – The query params
Returns:

A record
Return type:

json

Example

import cesdspy.records
records.get('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091', 'RSF2v0', '1468500823')

# Returns:
# {
#   'variables': [
#     {
#       'id': '@1edb6d30-5d812ce6',
#       'value': -0.7799999713897705
#     },
#     {
#       'id': '@1edb6d30-d9847159',
#       'value': -33.380001068115234
#     },
#     ...
#   ],
#   'id': '1468500823'
# }

Example

from cesdspy import records
query = {
    'variables': '@1edb6d30-d9847159, @1edb6d30-fa21e31d'
}
records.get('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091', 'RSF2v0', '1468500823', query)

# Returns:
# {
#   'variables': [
#     {
#       'id': '@1edb6d30-fa21e31d',
#       'value': 0.10500000417232513
#     },
#     {
#       'id': '@1edb6d30-d9847159',
#       'value': -33.380001068115234
#     }
#   ],
#   'id': '1468500823'
# }

API Info:

GET /models/{model_id}/records¶
Response JSON Object:
 
  • variables (array(dict)) – A list of variables each with ‘id’ and ‘value’ keys
  • id (string) – A record ID
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error description
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error description
cesdspy.records.insert(api_url, model_id, body={})¶

Add a single record

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – The base url to query
  • model_id (string) – The model id
  • body (json) – The record to insert
Returns:

The result of the insert
Return type:

json

Examples

import cesdspy
record = {
  'variables': [
    {
      'id': '@1edb6d30-5d812ce6',
      'value': -0.7799999713897705
    },
    {
      'id': '@1edb6d30-d9847159',
      'value': -29.600000381469727
    },
    ...
  ]
}
cesdspy.records.insert('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091/', 'RSF2v0', record)

# Returns:
# {
#     "result": "ok"
# }

API Info:

POST /models/{model_id}/records¶
Request JSON Object:
 
  • variables (array(dict)) – A list of variables each with ‘id’ and ‘value’ keys
  • id (string) – A record ID
Response JSON Object:
 
  • result (string) – The result of the insert
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error description
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error description
cesdspy.records.list(api_url, model_id, query={})¶

Get a single record

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – The base url to query
  • model_id (string) – The model id
  • record_id (string) – The record id
  • query (json) – The query params
Returns:

A list of records
Return type:

json

Examples

import cesdspy
query = {
    variables: '@1edb6d30-5d812ce6, @1edb6d30-d9847159, @1edb6d30-9a89271e',
    from: '',
    to: ''
}
cesdspy.records.get('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8091/', 'RSF2v0', query)

# Returns:
# [
#     {
#       'variables': [
#         {
#           'id': '@1edb6d30-5d812ce6',
#           'value': -0.7799999713897705
#         },
#         {
#           'id': '@1edb6d30-d9847159',
#           'value': -29.600000381469727
#         },
#         ...
#       ],
#       'id': '1468500780'
#     },
#     ...
# ]

API Info:

GET /models/{model_id}/records/{record_id}¶
Response JSON Object:
 
  • variables (array(dict)) – A list of variables each with ‘id’ and ‘value’ keys
  • id (string) – A record ID
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error description
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error description
cesdspy.records.root = 'models'¶

The root endpoint

CESDSpy
